## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fa4a36cd60c63b664bb0a20f40ca875470df80c8f9a2594cff9ad28c26f0764e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'metronome-synth-info-lib' @ 20.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
